name: ThemeParkNewsfromCoasterRadiocom
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: CoasterRadio.com is the Original Theme Park Podcast. Since 2005, we have been producing a weekly show all about theme parks and thrill rides. Now, we are bringing you daily news about the amusement industry... direct to your Amazon device!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
